shows.title: UFO Revelations / Frequency Healing
shows.first_half: In the first half, UFO activist Stephen Bassett joins Rich Berra (email) to dive into the biggest bombshells from this year’s Contact in the Desert conference — from new claims about alien contact to fresh government leaks. In the second half, healer and intuitive Ondre Seltzer explores the world of Frequency Energy Medicine, revealing how tuning our personal energy can unlock deep healing and transformation. Plus, he’ll offer live on-air frequency readings.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell - Somewhere in Time returns to 2/12/01 when Colm Kelleher of NIDS spoke about the organization's research and study of fringe science and the paranormal.

shows.title: PSI Abilities / Psychic Therapy
shows.first_half: First Half: Joining Lisa Garr (email), survivalist and author Hakim Isler talks about his Psi Games event, and its role in unlocking human potential. He'll also discuss wilderness and survival training, remote viewing, and mind sight, the integration of ancient wisdom with modern research, and the practical applications of psi abilities.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Psychic medium Sondra Sneed will share insights on how to communicate with God and reveal how her guidance has evolved into a transformative method of psychic therapy.

shows.title: National Guard & Protests / Expeditions & Mysteries
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and constitutional lawyer Jonathan Emord will discuss the National Guard, the authority to call them in, and their role when it comes to keeping the peace. He'll also comment on the current protests taking place, ICE, and the deployment of Marines.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Explorer and archaeologist Josh Gates (star of the Discovery Channel’s "Expedition Unknown") will describe the many adventures and mysteries that he and his team have uncovered. His work includes such topics as Hitler’s long-range plane called the Amerikabomber and the man-eating lions of Tsavo.

shows.title: Naturopathic Medicine / Salem Witch Trials
shows.first_half: Dr. Randi Shannon, a dedicated Naturopathic Doctor with over 20 years of experience, will discuss how she uses 5,000-year-old original medicine to heal chronic conditions and restore health. Followed by professor Paul DeBole who'll discuss the Salem Witch trials and set the record straight on some important and widespread misconceptions, as well as talk about their legacy and how they may affect us today.

shows.title: Gambling Addiction / Remote Viewing & Aliens
shows.first_half: First Half: Gaming and gambling therapist Howard Riback will detail the pros & cons of the sometimes insidious world of gambling. He believes that more rules must be put in place to make this a safe pastime, and will share details of his own gambling intervention.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and mystifier Uri Geller will discuss the secrets of the powers of prediction, and delve into remote viewing, dowsing, spoon-bending, aliens among us, and more. Uri will also talk about his unique life.

shows.title: Terrorism Threats / Near-Death Experiences
shows.first_half: First Half: Author Jeffrey Simon will discuss his 40-year career researching and writing about terrorism and the changes he has seen, and reveal what he sees as major threats we face today.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Former neurosurgeon Eben Alexander, MD, will tell the story of his near-death experience (NDE) and talk about how NDEs and scientific studies into related phenomena serve as evidence of a generalized consciousness independent of the brain. He believes these findings indicate a soul’s growth in understanding over more than one physical lifetime and how the binding force of love leads towards wholeness and healing.

shows.title: What's in a Name? / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Maryelizabeth Clark loves names! She joins Connie Willis (info) to tell us how we can discover the meaning of our names, as well as their origin, historical significance, notable namesakes, popularity trends, geographical relevance, gender associations, and more. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
